I'm happy to announce that magrittr 2.0 is on CRAN! It solves longstanding issues of overhead and now uses a lazy approach for increased compatibility with the future base pipe `|>` of #RStats 4.1. Read about it at https://t.co/KcTgtomAS5

My first R models are in production. Many thanks to @skyetetra for the GitHub repo on using R & Docker. Proud to say that all work was done in @rstudio using {tidyverse}, {tidymodels}, and more. #RStats

Hey #rstats (and anyone else who writes code for data science). 
How do you teach debugging to people who are more junior? I feel like it's such an important skill and yet we seem to have no structured framework for teaching it

So I'm in the process of hiring an early-career #DataAnalyst with specific domain expertise as well as #rstats and #sql skills.  The first few CVs I've seen have been interesting. If I have the energy, or there's lots of interest, I'll summarise the good and bad in all of them.
We got a #Rbaby on our hands. #Rstats https://t.co/f1gbCwEfPM
